name: yuzha-monorepo
description: Monorepo apps (Launcher + modules) with shared hub. OPSI 3: multi-URL, single Supabase project (multi-schema).

scripts.dev: echo Pilih app: npm run dev:launcher atau dev:modul
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:launcher" "npm run dev:0setting" "npm run dev:1meng" "npm run dev:3database" "npm run dev:4extra" "npm run dev:5rara"
scripts.build: echo Pilih app: npm run build:launcher (atau build:<modul>)
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build:launcher" "npm run build:0setting" "npm run build:1meng" "npm run build:3database" "npm run build:4extra" "npm run build:5rara"
